actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A joint resolution to recognize June 5, 1992, as "World Environment Day" and to urge that the United Nations Conference on Environment and Development be given highest priority by the United States.

summary.text: Recognizes June 5, 1992, as World Environment Day. Urges the United States to: (1) place the highest priority on the United Nations Conference on Environment and Development; and (2) take a strong leadership role in the Conference and underline the urgency of the critical environmental problems facing the world today.

titles.title: A joint resolution to recognize June 5, 1992, as "World Environment Day" and to urge that the United Nations Conference on Environment and Development be given highest priority by the United States.
